pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nose ignore docstrings======================This is a plugin for nose. If this plugin is active, nose doesn't usedocstrings to name tests.Installation------------You can install or upgrade ``nose-ignore-docstring`` with these commands:: $ pip install nose-ignore-docstring $ pip install --upgrade nose-ignore-docstringUsage-----Pass the ``--with-ignore-docstrings`` option to ``nosetests``:: $ nosetests --with-ignore-docstrings -v ...Or define the following entry in ``setup.cfg``:: [nosetests] with-ignore-docstrings=1Changes-------0.1 - 2013-04-17````````````````* First release
